column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Toph , metalbend the rudder so it 's jammed in a turning position .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Have I ever mentioned how sweet it is that you invented metalbending ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You could stand to mention it more .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't think boomerang 's coming back , Toph .
#Text=It looks like this is the end .
#Text=" Toph says : " How did that happen ?
